ingredients.text: One 2-inch (5cm) piece of fresh ginger, peeled and grated
2-pounds (900g) boneless chicken thighs (4-8 thighs, depending on size)

Kosher salt and freshly ground black pepper

One 4-pound whole grass-fed chicken, butterflied (ask your butcher to do this for you)

-- Salt and fresh-ground pepper, to taste

1¼ lbs. (20 oz.) bone-in, skinless chicken thighs

Coarse salt and freshly ground black pepper

Zest 1 and juice 2 lime , plus lime wedges to serve

baked potato or baked sweet potato, to serve
2-3 tablespoons vegetable oil, to shallow fry
4 oz. good butter at room temperature
Several sprigs of thyme or tarragon, or a mixture of the two

recipes.name: Cook the Book: Perfect Roasted Chicken

ingredients.text: 500 gs boneless chicken (17 ozs) breasts or thighs
1 sprig rosemary stem removed and minced
3 sprigs thyme stems removed and minced
1 clay pot, seasoned and large enough to hold a whole chicken, preferably a locally grown, uncaged chicken
Coarse salt and freshly ground pepper
Coarse salt and freshly ground pepper
3 large garlic cloves, crushed plus 2 cloves, thinly sliced
3 large garlic cloves, crushed plus 2 cloves, thinly sliced
1 cup homemade or canned low-sodium chicken stock
Kosher salt and freshly ground pepper
Kosher salt and freshly ground pepper
1 tablespoon grated ginger, plus 12 slices ginger
2 serrano chiles, seeded and thinly sliced
30 grams ginger (~ 1-inch piece), peeled and sliced
600 grams whole stewed tomatoes (1 1/2 small cans)
2 lbs. chicken pieces, on the bone (dark meat is best, but you can use a mix if you'd like)
2 cups homemade or good quality chicken stock
8 chicken legs (6 to 8 ounces each), split and skin removed
1/3 cup kalamata olives, pitted and halved
4 pounds chicken parts (preferably legs, thighs, and wings), rinsed and patted dry
5 boneless,skinless chicken thighs,cut into 1-2 inch chunks
1 cup hot sauce (i use texas pete, but use your favorite
Del real shredded chicken or beef 1 200g pack of cooked chicken tikka fillets (i use tesco)
1-2 green chillis, deseeded (or leave them in if you like it hot!)
3 scotch bonnet peppers (any color), seeded and minced
2 sprigs fresh thyme or 2 tablespoons dried
5 pounds chicken thighs or 2 small whole chickens, cut into quarters (see note)
1 thumb-size piece of fresh ginger , peeled and very finely chopped
1 fresh red chilli , deseeded and sliced
1 whole chicken (about 3 1/2 pounds), rinsed and patted dry
Kroger breaded chicken foster farms chicken or turkey franks or hoffy meat franks 3.5 lbs chicken
1 whole 4-pound chicken, giblets reserved for another use
1 small chicken, no more than 3.5 pounds
Selection of chopped fresh herbs (marjoram and rosemary are good)

1.25 pounds lean, first cut flanken (top rib) from a kosher butcher. this is similar to short rib, but cut across the bone. trim any large pieces of fate and cut into bite sized pieces. leave some meat attached to each bone.
.5 pounds chicken gizzards, trimmed of any green or yellow skin and halved
1 container pomi strained tomatoes (26.46 ounce box) or canned or jarred strained tomatoes of similar package size.
2 tablespoons sugar (i use natural cane sugar), plus more to taste
2 tablespoons freshly squeezed lemon juice, plus more to taste
1 teasoon salt, plus more to taste
A few grinds of pepper to taste
2.5 pounds chicken wings, cut at the joints and tips reserved for another use.
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
1/4 cup finely-chopped cilantro stems or 3 cilantro roots, finely chopped
2 teaspoons whole white peppercorns or freshly-ground white pepper
1″ knob of ginger grated into paste
3 medium onions sliced thin across the rings
2″ piece of cassia bark (aka saigon cinnamon)
3-4 pounds chicken parts (thighs and legs recommended), skin-on, bone-in, trimmed of excess fat
2 Tbsp fresh chopped thyme (or 2 teaspoons dried)
1 Tbsp fresh chopped rosemary (or 1 teaspoon dried)
1.25 pounds boneless, skinless chicken thighs, cut into 1/4-inch strips
1/4 cup torn basil leaves, plus additional 1 tablespoon
1/4 cup freshly chopped parsley leaves, stems reserved
1 pound carrots, peeled and cut crosswise into 1/2-inch pieces
1 pound parsnips, peeled and cut crosswise into 1/2-inch pieces
1 to 2 medium onions, cut into 1/2-inch pieces
20 pounds chicken thighs, skin-on, bone- in, trimmed of excess fat pockets and extra skin
1 large bunch of fresh parsley (or just stalks if you’re using leaves for something else)
20 kalamata olives, pitted, chopped - you can use all of one kind, or a mixture
2 lemons, zested, then sliced, skin and pith removed
1 tablespoon tablespoon fresh rosemary leaves (about 2 branches)
Pinch of red pepper flakes (or to taste)
2 Alaskan king crab legs, picked of their meat
6 to 8 asparagus spears, top 3 inches only, blanched in heavily salted water until crunchy tender
1 stick, unsalted butter, melted and kept warm
kosher salt and fresh ground pepper
